content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
No structures have been successfully built on the map. Although several attempts were made to place a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) and to craft it for supplying Automation Science Packs, none of these operations resulted in a new structure. All queries for entities returned “None,” and the furnaces used for smelting were only retrieved rather than constructed in this execution.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Errors when calling get_entities:
  – Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or supplying incorrect numbers of positional arguments. Always verify the API’s required parameters before invoking the function.
  
• Errors when placing objects:
  – Ensure that the required item (e.g., Lab) is present in the inventory before attempting placement on a specific tile.
  
• Errors due to unvalidated function outputs:
  – Check that functions like get_entities return a valid iterable rather than None before performing operations such as iteration.
  
• Crafting prerequisite errors:
  – Confirm that all sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels and electronic-circuits) and their resource chains are fully available. Verify that the necessary crafting machines or furnaces are operational so that intermediate products (like iron plates and copper plates) can be produced.
  
• Insufficient resource errors:
  – Double-check ingredient counts and dependencies before reattempting lab crafting; missing components indicate that either resource levels or production capabilities need to be improved before proceeding.
